mapper.select: SELECT c.c_no,c.writer,c.ttl,c.cntn,c.pay,c.inq,c.rprt,c.dt_reg,c.dt_cls,c.dt_extns , CASE WHEN c.dt_extns IS NOT NULL THEN (TO_DATE (c.dt_extns, 'YY/MM/DD')) - (TO_DATE (sysdate, 'YY/MM/DD')) ELSE (TO_DATE (c.dt_cls, 'YY/MM/DD')) - (TO_DATE (sysdate, 'YY/MM/DD')) END AS dDay ,(select sev_nm from files where target_Id = c_no) AS img ,code_select(c.style) style ,code_select(c.category) category ,(select count(*) from likes where target_no = c_no) AS likes FROM likes l JOIN CONTEST c ON C.C_NO = L.TARGET_NO and l.USER_ID = #{userId}
